participant_1.background:

I don't play any sports, but I enjoy hiking and biking on my days off.
I teach my students about art and share my opinions about art on the internet.

my favorite book is jane austen s pride and prejudice.

content.text: Hey, I'm Sarah. What's your name?
Hi Sarah, I'm Michael. What do you do for fun?
I like to go hiking and biking. I also love to sing.
That sounds great. I need to get out and get some exercise. I love meat and winter is my favorite time of the year.
I really love British shows and movies. I just binged on a ton of them while I was on vacation.
That sounds fun. I need to watch more TV shows. I'm a teacher and I spend most of my time working.
That's great! I'm a teacher too. I love sharing my love of art with my students.
That's awesome. I need to remind myself to eat healthier foods. I love meat, but it's not the healthiest.
I'm trying to get better at eating healthier too. I need to make more time to cook.
I know what you mean. I need to be better about that. I'm easily agitated, so I need to take care of myself.
That's good to know. I need to be better about taking care of myself too. I'm glad we met, Michael.
Me too, Sarah. It was nice talking to you.
